title: Soulfire
desc:
Post 1716
- You may choose a card in your hand as you play this. It gets transformed into (1716) Soulfire.
- If anything makes you discard a card, you must choose this card if it is in your hand.
- If anything other than this card forces you to draw a card, it will replace this card if it is in your hand.
- This cannot be part of any starting hand.
